subject: Photography
title: Creative White Balance Shifts
description: One-minute skill: Creative White Balance Shifts.

hook.text: What if you don't want accurate color? Creative white balance turns reality into something more expressive.

buildup.text: Pushing white balance warm makes images feel cozy and nostalgic. Pulling it cool feels clinical or futuristic.

discovery.text: Fluorescent white balance under daylight creates an otherworldly purple-blue tone ‚Äî popular in art photography.

twist.text: There's no 'correct' white balance for creative work. The right setting is whatever serves the emotion of the image.

climax.text: Many iconic photo looks ‚Äî vintage film, sci-fi blue, desert gold ‚Äî are just creative white balance choices.

punchline.text: Accuracy is one option. Expression is another.

quiz.question: What effect does pushing white balance warm create?
options: A cozy, nostalgic feeling in the image
